About

Subtitle

Csongor is a web designer and developer with great user experience skills

Featured image

Content

Design

Native web designers work directly in the browser skipping Photoshop, Sketch or other mockup tools reducing project time by half. Csongor is one of them.

Since 2009 he designed brand identity, e-commerce websites, landing pages for businesses, artist portfolios, blogs and magazines for international companies and organizations.

View portfolio

Development

Front-end development with standards and latest technologies—HTML5, CSS3, jQuery—is where Csongor is most skilled.

On back-end he is using extensively Wordpress and Jekyll—and—MVC frameworks like Ruby on Rails and Yii.

View code on Github

User Experience

Every website is a product delivering a message for a target audience. Products are successful by better-than-expected experiences driving people to engagement.
